jadakiss: :  niggas broke off some rabbits went up north with habits and then turn from boss to average cant afford then you aint got what it cost to have it when a love of a family members loss its tragic digging in my pocket tryna find a knot moved a little minor rock cause they was only scrapping on a minor block playing in the building transforming pain into millions off dimes of chocolate what a feeling high-top harlems with the strap still on em no baggies capsules wrestlin and slap skills everybody bussed it fried baloney sandwich with the mustard shit either you ate or you flushed it think about it those were the best days on the phone with shorty while you ironing your clothes for the next day lunch money turned into pack money dudes i was cool with starting to act funny honeys wanna hit so they starting to scrap for me imagine what its gonna be when i get this rap money looking up to whoever was known for cooking up you could be taken in or you could be tooken up stand firm like a man  never get shooken up swear you can make it my nigga...just look at us what goes around comes around again know the same rule applies from now till then

:  yo... now its getting spooky it switched to the acura integs and suzukis lotta ninos and pookies dapper dan... silks and ballys ropes dookie whoever was in office was letting it flow loosely sent crack some niggas came home then went back thugged out shit wasnt the same so they bugged out i dont wanna rush into it looking at my uncles and cousins do it thinking to myself theres nothing to it now i gotta pager and the minor rock turned major cause the fiends is looking for the flavor nice little run with the crew money wasnt coming fast as i wanted it to so i fell back took a deep breath inhaled rap waited for a spot to open up and held that even tho its still a lotta bumps in the road yo everything is well-earned nothing is old though think about it while cleaning and loading the 4-4 reality is death is convienent to most folks the torch is lit and me im just fortunate to be in it for this long still scorching shit every verse is food every song is dinner i belong with winners only the strongest finish so you could be cool or you can wild till the end but the same rules apply from now till then
